Title: The Truth About Unicorns
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), John Romano
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Carrie is let out of prison. Lucas is waiting on her. They take a detour to the house they talked about so long ago. They are not alone in their dream. Someone has followed them there. Is it Rabbit? Is it Gordon? Is it Agent Racine?
